Useless.The keys provided can not register the product.Keys are helpful just to install it. waste of time.

Acronis has changed their game! Now they require online activation. Even the boot cd checks for updates upon start up in the Acronis/Linux environment.

The crack teams out there are going to have to adjust now. Simply getting serials won't cut it any more! lol

Can anyone who has the talent to make a crack for this give us the details on your progress.

The Key by itself does not work there for it requires an online activation.

This is what I'm fearing relating to the Upcoming Windows 8 that may require an online activation.
sure as hell hope da generator isnt far behind -.-'

The Key that is in the Torrent worked fine for me. Had a 100% easy and successful install.

INSTRUCTIONS:
Kill your internet. Unplug or whatever you choose.
Open the Folder and start the Install
When Prompted enter the Key in the torrent folder
Leave internet unplugged and restart PC as prompted.
After restart open program to test if it opens - it should.
Plug internet in.

SUCCESS!

guys! here's how you do it:

2install
3enter the serial: AKH7K4E3-XXN4H5BQ-CYP64NAA-WF98JT7T-CLFS3BBM-LKUMEJU4-N78YSFZ8-VZZEYMXW
4activate
5choose the option to activate on another pc
6enter the activation code below the activation request code: MCwCFHdME/n6l09VZW4IdzSj69jbQou/AhQmCU9RMojm77gqU5ZAPPeMJRP9hA==
7block all connections to this app in your firewall so it doesnt detect fake activation.
8happy pirating
